name: ALAsset
desc: An ALAsset object represents a photo or a video managed by the Photo application.

items.name: func value(forProperty: String!) -> Any!
items.desc: Returns the value for a given property.

items.name: var isEditable: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the asset is editable.

items.name: var original: ALAsset!
items.desc: The original version of the asset.

items.name: func defaultRepresentation() -> ALAssetRepresentation!
items.desc: Returns an asset representation object for the default representation.

items.name: func representation(forUTI: String!) -> ALAssetRepresentation!
items.desc: Returns an asset representation object for a given representation UTI.

items.name: func thumbnail() -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns a thumbnail representation of the asset.

items.name: func aspectRatioThumbnail() -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns an aspect ratio thumbnail of the asset.

items.name: func setImageData(Data!, metadata: [AnyHashable : Any]!, completionBlock: ALAssetsLibraryWriteImageCompletionBlock!)
items.desc: Replaces the image data in the receiver with given image data

items.name: func setVideoAtPath(URL!, completionBlock: ALAssetsLibraryWriteVideoCompletionBlock!)
items.desc: Replaces the video data in receiver with the video at a given URL.

items.name: func writeModifiedImageData(toSavedPhotosAlbum: Data!, metadata: [AnyHashable : Any]!, completionBlock: ALAssetsLibraryWriteImageCompletionBlock!)
items.desc: Saves image data to the Saved Photos album.

items.name: func writeModifiedVideoAtPath(toSavedPhotosAlbum: URL!, completionBlock: ALAssetsLibraryWriteVideoCompletionBlock!)
items.desc: Saves the video at a specified path to the Saved Photos album.
